name: Melvins
description: '''Melvins''' (sometimes '''The Melvins''') are an American [[Rock music|rock]] band formed in 1983 in [[Montesano, Washington]]. Their early work was key to the development of both [[grunge]] and [[sludge metal]]. Primarily a trio, they have also performed as a quartet, with either two drummers or two bassists. Since 1984, vocalist and guitarist [[Buzz Osborne]] and drummer [[Dale Crover]] have been constant members.
